meanings: leaving alone, negligence, 방치하다 leave[let] ((a thing, a person)) alone, leave ((a matter)) as it is, leave ((a person)) to himself, leave ((a matter)) to chance, neglect
neglect, leave[let] sb[sth] alone[unattended], leave sth as it is[stands]
leave the situation as it is

examples.korean: The place smelled of decay and neglect. 발음듣기 그 장소에서는 부패와 방치의 냄새가 났다. Oxford Advanced Learner's English-Korean Dictionary
examples.english: The place smelled of decay and neglect. 발음

examples.korean: prisoners thrown in jail and left to rot 발음듣기 감방에 처넣어진 채 썩어 가도록 방치되는 죄수들 Oxford Advanced Learner's English-Korean Dictionary
examples.english: prisoners thrown in jail and left to rot 발음

examples.korean: The law imposes penalties for the neglect of children. 발음듣기 법률에서는 아동 방치 행위에 대해 벌금을 부과한다. Oxford Advanced Learner's English-Korean Dictionary
examples.english: The law imposes penalties for the neglect of children. 발음

examples.korean: The buildings had been neglected for years. 발음듣기 그 건물들은 오랫동안 방치된 상태였다. Oxford Advanced Learner's English-Korean Dictionary
examples.english: The buildings had been neglected for years. 발음

examples.korean: All too often the animals die through neglect. 발음듣기 그 동물들이 방치되어 죽는 일이 너무나 흔하다. Oxford Advanced Learner's English-Korean Dictionary
examples.english: All too often the animals die through neglect. 발음
